sen.j: 広小路通（ひろこうじどおり）は、京都府京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Hirokoji-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Hirokoji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Hirokoji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 東は河原町通から西は寺町通までで、距離は約100m程度と短い。
sen.e: This street runs from Kawaramachi-dori Street at east to Teramachi-dori Street at west, the length is short, approximately 100m.
The street runs from Kawaramachi-dori Street in the east to Teramachi-dori Street in the west. Its overall length is fairly short, running approximately 100m.
The street runs from Kawaramachi-dori Street in the east to Teramachi-dori Street in the west. Its overall length is fairly short, running approximately 100m.

sen.j: 全区間が上京区内に含まれる。
sen.e: All section is inside of Kamigyo-Ward.
The entire street resides inside of Kamigyo-Ward.
The entire street resides inside of Kamigyo Ward.

sen.j: 立命館大学が現校地の北区 (京都市)衣笠キャンパスに移転する1981年まで本部を構えていた。
sen.e: Ristumeikan University had a main office until they relocated to Kinugasa Campus at present in Kita-Ward (Kyoto City) in 1981.
Ristumeikan University had a main office until they relocated to the Kinugasa Campus in Kita-Ward (Kyoto City) in 1981.
Ristumeikan University had a main office until they relocated to the Kinugasa Campus in Kita Ward (Kyoto City) in 1981.

sen.j: そのため、百万遍交差点が京都大学を指すように、広小路は立命館大学を意味して使われていたこともある。
sen.e: Because of that, as Hyakumanben Crossing was going for Kyoto University, Hirokoji-dori Street meant going for Ristumeikan University.
Due to this, as Hyakumanben Intersection indicated its use for heading to Kyoto University, Hirokoji-dori Street indicates going to Ristumeikan University.
Due to this, as Hyakumanben Intersection indicated its use for heading to Kyoto University, Hirokoji-dori Street indicates going to Ristumeikan University.

sen.j: 跡地は京都府立医科大学の図書館や京都府立文化芸術会館などになっている。
sen.e: The remain became a library of Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and Kyoto Prefectural center for Arts & Culture.
The remains became a library for the Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and the Kyoto Prefectural center for Arts & Culture.
The remains became a library for the Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and the Kyoto Prefectural center for Arts & Culture.
